body_html: It's a bit off-topic but I've found that doing U = math_ops.matmul(inputs, self._kernel) inside the def call(self, inputs, state): is not helpful to achieve the 10x speed up mentioned in the paper. I believe the matrix multiply should happen outside of the call.
body_text: It's a bit off-topic but I've found that doing U = math_ops.matmul(inputs, self._kernel) inside the  def call(self, inputs, state): is not helpful to achieve the 10x speed up mentioned in the paper. I believe the matrix multiply should happen outside of the call.
body: It's a bit off-topic but I've found that doing `U = math_ops.matmul(inputs, self._kernel)` inside the ` def call(self, inputs, state):` is not helpful to achieve the 10x speed up mentioned in the paper. I believe the matrix multiply should happen outside of the `call`.
